recipesJson.name: Zombie MaXX Energy
recipesJson.author: DaddyKane91
recipesJson.description: My Take on the Monster Nitro Maxx Solarius Energy Drink , what i got from the actual drink .. a wine like grape fruit, with sweet and tart notes.. coupled with alot of carbonation which we all know is quite hard to duplicate in a juice.. anyway this is for the DDU challenge , not looking to win anything ...i know im not using any of the flavors on the list ..lol.. just mixxing for fun ...hope all enjoy
